review_title: Great Team in an Innovative and Dynamic Environment
job_title: Senior Project Manager in Ottawa, ON
pros:
- Flexible environment (ability to work from home, flex hours)
- Great team members (supportive, collaborative, friends as well as colleagues)
- Opportunities for growth and promotion
- Engage with teams in the Middle East and Africa
- Good vacation benefits
cons:
- As a smaller organization, not as many policies and procedures in place (can be good or bad depending on your preference)
- Workload can be intense at times

review_title: Lot of opportunities to change things
pros: People are amazing. It is an amazing opportunity to learn and grow professionally. DOT has a house full of absolutely smart and driven folks. It operates like a startup at times. There are not a lot of systems in place, however if you as an employee have ideas on how to fix it you will be given the opportunity to experiment and put in the system.
cons: Long working hours. Sometimes there is no worklife balance and the HR does not care to fix it.

job_title: Research and Learning Officer in Ottawa, ON
pros: I Good have a good experience at this organization
cons: Poor communication is challenge at this organization

job_title: Finance Systems Manager in Ottawa, ON
pros: nice place to sharpen your skills
cons: fixed budgets do not allow to grow
